Issue.creator: aambati
Issue.summary: As a revoker, I need to revoke a user with Idemix credentials
Issue.description: A revoker must have ability to revoke a user's Idemix credentials. A user must also have ability to revoke his/her own Idemix credentials. All X509 certificate revocation access control mechanisms must apply when revoking Idemix credentials. Authentication token based on either x509 or Idemix credential must be accepted.
